name: Soccerbot
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soccer bot
des: Soccerbot is currently capable of telling you where to watch matches from selected leagues, specifically Premier League, Bundesliga, MLS and Liga MX. Both tv stations and webpages available. You can also get match date information from the most popular leagues.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
